title: The Antarctic Emperor Penguin
description: The Emperor Penguin is the tallest and heaviest of all living penguin species. It breeds in the coldest environment of any bird and is an incredible deep-water diver.

questions.question: Where do Emperor Penguins live and breed?
How deep can an Emperor Penguin dive in search of food?
What unique behavior do male Emperor Penguins perform during the harsh winter?
options: They huddle together to stay warm and incubate their eggs
questions.correct_answer: They huddle together to stay warm and incubate their eggs

questions.question: Emperor penguins have a thick layer of fat called blubber. What is its purpose?
options: To help them float in the water
To keep them warm and store energy
questions.correct_answer: To keep them warm and store energy

questions.question: Unlike many other birds, Emperor Penguins do not build a nest. Where do they incubate their egg?
options: On the ground in a sheltered spot
On their feet under a special fold of skin
questions.correct_answer: On their feet under a special fold of skin
